attributes.action: ban Daily Mail readers from creating e-petitions with racist, homophobic or otherwise discriminatory overtones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sorry to waste yet more of your time - but really... these people!

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
